snippet: For the Kennedy Center of Performing Arts in Washington, “JUBA! Masters of Tap and Percussive Dance” constituted a first-of-its-kind program of the form’s variety.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance concert JUBA! Masters of Tap and Percussive Dance, organized by Chicago Human Rhythm Project founder Lane Alexander, at Kennedy Center of Performing Arts in Washington.
lead_paragraph: For the Kennedy Center of Performing Arts in Washington, “JUBA! Masters of Tap and Percussive Dance” constituted a first-of-its-kind program of the form’s variety.

headline.seo: JUBA! Masters of Tap and Percussive Dance at the Kennedy Center in Washington
headline.main: The State of Tap: A Survey Course
headline.print_headline: The State Of Tap: A Survey Course
